message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for a competitive price of $12,000. I believe it offers significant value, and this offer reflects its worth.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $8,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is my bottom line. I know this product will be very valuable for you, and I'm confident this is a fair price.
